snippet: Four assailants fired automatic weapons and detonated suicide belts in a confrontation that left them and three Saudi border guards dead.
abstract: Four heavily armed men trying to cross border from Iraq into Saudi Arabia are killed during clash with Saudi border patrol, along with three guards; incident could stoke fears of jihadist infiltrations, although it is unclear which group is responsible for attack.
lead_paragraph: Four assailants fired automatic weapons and detonated suicide belts in a confrontation that left them and three Saudi border guards dead.

headline.main: Border Clash With Iraqis Kills Seven, Saudis Say
headline.print_headline: Border Clash With Iraqis Kills Seven, Saudis Say

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
